subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: A day after losing out on second baseman Chase Utley, whom the Dodgers got from Philadelphia, San Francisco acquired outfielder Marlon Byrd from Cincinnati to shore up its outfield.
snippet: A day after losing out on second baseman Chase Utley, whom the Dodgers got from Philadelphia, San Francisco acquired outfielder Marlon Byrd from Cincinnati to shore up its outfield.
